name: Legend of Egypt - Pharaohs Garden
description:
Using the artifact of life, the gods created wonderful gardens in egyptian land. After the disappearance of the artefact, the gardens withered and fell to dust …

Build a new and even more beautiful park on the edge of the Nile for Pharaoh's daughter. Earn bonuses and trophies to expand the park and create flowering gardens, fountains, sculptures, obelisks and pavilions. A challenging match 3 adventure, puzzles and bonuses, upgrades, extras, trophies and a gripping story await you!

• Match-3 game with many extras
• Play through a challenging, Egyptian fairy tale
• Build a fantastic garden park on the edge of the Nile
• Earn different bonuses, upgrades, trophies and extras
• Solve exciting puzzles and bonuses
